messages.text: Hello! I'm here to help you troubleshoot your non-responsive touchscreen. How can I assist you today?
My touchscreen is not responding.
Could you please provide the model of your device?
It's a Samsung Galaxy S21.
Thank you. Have you tried restarting your device?
No, I haven't tried restarting yet.
Please restart your device and let me know if the touchscreen starts responding.
I restarted my device, but the touchscreen is still not responding.
Alright. Let's try recalibrating the touchscreen. Please go to Settings > Display > Touchscreen Calibration and follow the on-screen instructions. Let me know if this resolves the issue.
I did that, but the touchscreen is still not responding.

I see. Let's try entering Safe Mode to check if a third-party app is causing the problem. To enter Safe Mode, press and hold the power button, then tap and hold 'Power Off' until you see 'Safe Mode'. Please let me know once you're in Safe Mode.
Okay, I'm in Safe Mode now.
This indicates that a third-party app might be causing the issue. Try uninstalling recently installed apps one by one to identify the culprit. Let me know if you need further assistance.
I changed my mind; I want to go back.
Thank you. Have you tried restarting your device?
Yes, I have already restarted it.
Alright. Let's try recalibrating the touchscreen. Please go to Settings > Display > Touchscreen Calibration and follow the on-screen instructions. Let me know if this resolves the issue.

No, it's still not responding.

Since the touchscreen is still not responding in Safe Mode, it might be a hardware issue. I recommend contacting the manufacturer or visiting an authorized service center for further assistance. Is there anything else I can help you with?
No, that's all. Thank you.
You're welcome! If you have any other issues in the future, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
